name: Update a book
description:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
  as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.
descriptionHtml:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.

steps.name: Given I have valid permissions to manage the bookstore
And I have some unique data of a book
Given a book exists in the bookstore

parameters.name: book
parameters.value: Book[id=1786219556, title=Look Homeward, Angel, description=Iste cupiditate error., pageCount=504, excerpt=Dolorem optio quod. Dolorem numquam occaecati ut eum blanditiis sed facilis. Quam ex fuga est et eos voluptatem., publishDate=2025-09-21T04:10:43.618174601Z]

steps.name: When I change selected information of that book

parameters.name: book
parameters.value: Book[id=1786219556, title=Look Homeward, Angel (2nd ed.), description=Iste cupiditate error., pageCount=505, excerpt=Dolorem optio quod. Dolorem numquam occaecati ut eum blanditiis sed facilis. Quam ex fuga est et eos voluptatem., publishDate=2025-09-21T04:10:43.618174601Z]

steps.name: Then the updated information about the book is visible to users
